mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile_image_files ( profile_image_id, profile_image_name, profile_image_size, profile_image_location, download_location, profile_image_ext ) VALUES ( profile_image_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{profileImageName}, #{profileImageSize}, #{profileImageLocation}, #{profileImageExt}, #{downloadLocation} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.id, u.name, u.email, u.tel, p.profile_image_name, p.profile_image_location FROM users u LEFT JOIN profile_image_files p ON u.id = p.log_id WHERE u.id = #{id}
